text: Ojo in musrike, ki ʙa kufri xud ʙahramand sudaast, ʙehtar ast, jo on kase, ki dar vaqthoi saʙ ʙa iʙodat pardoxta, jo dar sucud ast, jo dar qijom va az azoʙi oxirat metarsad va ʙa rahmati Parvardigoras umed dorad? Bigu: «Ojo onhoe, ki medonand haqiqati dinro ʙo onhoe, ki az din cizero namedonand, ʙaroʙarand?» (Hargiz ʙaroʙar nestand). Tanho xiradmandon pand megirand va farqi ʙajni olimon va cohilonro medonand
